attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enormous state benefits from the UK to Asylum seekers has shocked the Mayor of Calais.Wheras we offer them the world in their eyes, France offers them nothing. Surely all the do gooders & the Govt can see that if we offered nothing they would all go away to pastures new. Surely someone with backbone has got to do a double take & say WHOOOOO slow down, let us just look at what is happening to Britain. Someone I don't mind who, has got to put a stop to it all, mass immigration too. Just look at the immigrants now on benefits, this with the NHS is bleeding the country dry. I think the the voice of the people needs to be heard, the only way that would happen, is if the people voted for a Champion, someone who is not a politician,as the unrest does not seem to concern them & their kind. I rest my case

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
